惺.definition: (literary) to come to one's senses; to awaken; (literary) astute; sharp-witted

惺忪.definition: drowsy-eyed; (literary) wavering; indecisive; (literary) awake; conscious; clearheaded

惺惺相惜.definition: lit. people of talent appreciate one another (idiom); fig. to feel an affinity with (sb); to feel a bond with
